name: D1. Gregor and the Odd Cows  Easy
statement:
There are n fence-posts at distinct coordinates on a plane. It is
guaranteed that no three fence posts lie on the same line.There are an
infinite number of cows on the plane, one at every point with integer
coordinates.Gregor is a member of the Illuminati, and wants to build a
triangular fence, connecting 3 distinct existing fence posts. A cow
inside the fence is said to be . If there are an number of enclosed cows
and the area of the fence is an , the fence is said to be .Find the
number of interesting fences.
